definition: to tremble/to shiver/to shake/to vibrate/Taiwan pr. [zhan4]
sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)

sentences.english: What do you do, then, if you happen to end up with the wrong trill note at the end?
sentences.chinese: 那麼，如果你在臨近尾聲時彈錯了顫音上，該怎麼辦？

sentences.english: In fact, the hand vibrato is a tremolo rather than a vibrato .
sentences.chinese: 與其說手振音爲振音，還不如說它是一種顫音。

sentences.english: One of them is the technique you saw me do with my left hand where I wiggled it a little bit.
sentences.chinese: 其中一種就是我稍稍擺動我摁弦的左手，這種叫顫音。

sentences.english: Sustain, reverb, vibrato and stereo chorus.
sentences.chinese: 難以承受的，混響，顫音和立體聲合唱。

sentences.english: I encourage oboe and clarinet players to use plenty of vibrato .
sentences.chinese: 我鼓勵演奏雙簧管和單簧管的樂手們多使用顫音。

sentences.english: Her trills are far from pleasing to the ear .
sentences.chinese: 她唱歌的顫音一點也不悅耳。

sentences.english: I heard the faint warble of Laura's voice.
sentences.chinese: 我聽到勞拉那柔和的顫音。

sentences.english: Turkey Breast Roulade, Chestnut Stuffing, Cranberry Jelly.
sentences.chinese: 火雞胸脯顫音，栗子餡，蔓越莓果凍。

sentences.english: Bach wants you to trill one hand independently of the other.
sentences.chinese: 巴赫要求你能夠一隻手彈奏顫音，而不依靠另一隻手。

sentences.english: GW Do you generate vibrato by pressing down?
sentences.chinese: 你是用向下按弦來產生顫音嗎？

sentences.english: The boy trilled on a flute.
Mutual respect… she laughs and trills and she sings when she speaks.
sentences.chinese: 她的笑聲帶着顫音，說話像在唱歌。

sentences.english: In fact, boring rainy days also ask the tremolo of the strings.
sentences.chinese: 原來，沉悶的雨天也有顫音的琴絃撫出。

sentences.english: This may be appropriate for beginners or youngsters who have not yet learned to trill.
sentences.chinese: 這種方式或許對於初學者及尚未學習顫音的琴童適用。

definition: falsetto/opposite: natural or true voice 真聲|真声[zhen1 sheng1]
a drum-shaped rattle (used by peddlers or as a toy)/rattle-drum
variant of 戰慄|战栗[zhan4 li4]
genre of song-and-dance duet popular in northeast China
